trans-unit.source: Specifies the application ID (as a GUID) for this assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指定這個組件的應用程式識別碼 （GUID)。

trans-unit.source: ApplicationIDAttribute takes a GUID in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: ApplicationIDAttribute 會在其建構函式中的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: When registration occurs, the components in the assembly are installed in an application with the given ID.
trans-unit.target: 註冊時，組件中的元件會安裝在具有指定 ID 的應用程式

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute"></xref> class specifying the GUID representing the application ID for the COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute"></xref>類別指定代表 COM + 應用程式的應用程式識別碼的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID associated with the COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 使用 COM + 應用程式相關聯的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID of the COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 取得 COM + 應用程式的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Value is set by the constructor using the GUID passed in as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 值是由建構函式使用 GUID 做為參數傳遞的設定。

trans-unit.source: The GUID representing the COM+ application.
trans-unit.target: 代表 COM + 應用程式的 GUID。
